article_title: John Cole Cartoons  The do-nothing elephant
article_text:
—

Ringling Brothers announced last week that it was at long last retiring its elephant act. The decision to shutter the once popular pachyderm performance came as good news for animal lovers and elephants generally.

Meanwhile, elephants continue to steal the show at the circus otherwise known as Washington, DC. In this case, however, the “act” amounts to little more than inaction.

—

article_metadata.generator: WordPress 3.5.1, fitted with the WordPress Mobile Pack 1.2.4

article_summary:
—Ringling Brothers announced last week that it was at long last retiring its elephant act.
The decision to shutter the once popular pachyderm performance came as good news for animal lovers and elephants generally.
Meanwhile, elephants continue to steal the show at the circus otherwise known as Washington, DC.
In this case, however, the “act” amounts to little more than inaction.
